said David Letterman . "Being pummeled?" Anderson Cooper said. "I don't recommend it. I'd never been hit in the head before." He described the scene, saying, People came from all around, surrounding us, punching us, kicking us, trying to rip the clothes off my female producer. It was weird. And we were lucky, frankly....
